Header: Iran and ASEAN nations signed a friendship treaty on Thursday (August 2) in Singapore.
Content: Iranian Foreign Minister Mohammad Javad Zarif signed the Instrument of Accession to the Treaty of Amity and Cooperation in South East Asia along with all ASEAN foreign ministers.U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo who is due to arrive in Singapore will not meet with his Iranian counterpart during the meeting of Southeast Asian nations, a senior State Department official , a day after U.S. President Donald Trump offered talks with Tehran without preconditions. Both Pompeo and Zarif will attend Saturdayâ€™s meeting of the 10-nation Association of Southeast Asian Nations bloc .Trump he would be willing to meet with Iranian President Hassan Rouhani to discuss ways to improve ties, months after he pulled the United States out of the 2015 Iran nuclear deal in May.
